name: Yahoo! Japan news article width changer (2022-)
description:
Yahoo! Japanニュース サイトの記事の幅固定を解除します。
This script enables the fixed width of articles to be adjusted accordingly to the browser size.

I don't know how to edit my original post, so I put it here.
Original post: https://uso.kkx.one/style/135544
additional_info:
Tested browser: Firefox 102.3esr + Stylus
